meanings.definition: The act of riding on a board while kneeling on it, typically on water.
meanings.sent1: Kneeboarding is a fun way to glide on the water while kneeling.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy kneeboarding at the lake during summer.
meanings.sent3: When kneeboarding, remember to keep your balance to avoid falling!
meanings.sent4: Kneeboarding feels like dancing on the waves with a board.
meanings.sent5: The sun glistened on the water as she kneeboarded gracefully.

meanings.definition: A water sport in which a person is towed on a board while kneeling.
meanings.sent1: The family had a blast kneeboarding behind the boat.
meanings.sent2: Kneeboarding requires good arm strength to hold onto the rope.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't stop laughing as he kneeboarded and splashed water everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Kneeboarding is like being pulled by a friendly sea monster.
meanings.sent5: The wind rushed past her ears as she kneeboarded across the lake.
